products.name: Hyundai - HYtab Plus 8WB1 8" - 32GB - WiFi - Black
products.albumTitle: HYtab Plus 8WB1 8" - 32GB - WiFi
products.longDescription: The HYtab Plus 8WB1 is as exciting as it is attractive. Thin, lightweight and packing powerful tech, the 8" tablet runs on the latest Android 11 operating system, and possesses 2GB of RAM and 32GB of storage. Its powerful and energy-saving Quad-Core processor offers strong performance, increases app startup speed, allowing it to play videos more smoothly, while enabling an impressive multimedia experience. Store plenty of music, videos, photos and more with an built in microSD card slot that can expand the memory up to 128GB. Connect faster online with the all new AX WiFi connection, giving you the ability to browse, video chat, play games, watch movies and more.

products.name: Microsoft - Surface Pro 7+ - 12.3” Touch Screen – Intel Core i5 – 8GB Memory – 128GB SSD with Black Type Cover & Pen (Latest Model) - Platinum
products.albumTitle: Surface Pro 7+ - 12.3” Touch Screen – Intel Core i5 – 8GB Memory – 128GB SSD with Black Type Cover & Pen (Latest Model)
products.longDescription: Classic Surface Pro 2-in-1 design meets high-speed performance, giving you premium laptop power, a powerful tablet, or portable digital canvas designed to light up the best of Windows 11. You’re in control, with the fast, reliable 11th Gen Intel Core performance you need, front and rear-facing HD cameras and Studio Mics for crystal-clear video calls, and compatibility across generations of accessories, Type Covers, and more with both USB-C and USB-A ports, plus a MicroSD slot. Adjust the Kickstand, click on your type cover and do more of what you love — all at our best value for a Surface Pro powered by Intel.

products.name: Apple - Pre-Owned iPad 9.7" (5th Generation) 32GB Wi-Fi Tablet - Space Gray
products.albumTitle: Pre-Owned iPad 9.7" (5th Generation) 32GB Wi-Fi Tablet
products.longDescription: Apple's iPad is Flat-out fun. Learn, play, surf and create on the iPad's stunning Retina display. Whether you're enjoying photos, shopping, or building a presentation, the vivid 9.7-inch Retina display has the detail and size to really bring them to life. The 64-bit A9 chip delivers performance that makes every app feel fast and fluid. Explore rich learning apps, play graphics-intensive games, or even use two apps at once. All while enjoying up to 10 hours of battery life. The lastest iOS brings iPad to life like never before. New features and capabilities let you get more done, more quickly and easily, making it a phenomally powerful and personal experience. Your fingerprint is the perfect password because it's unique and always with you. Touch ID lets you unlock your iPad instantly and secure private data in apps. You can also use it to make purchases with Apple Pay in apps and websites.

products.name: Apple - Pre-Owned iPad 9.7" (5th Generation) 32GB Wi-Fi Tablet - Silver
products.albumTitle: Pre-Owned iPad 9.7" (5th Generation) 32GB Wi-Fi Tablet
products.longDescription: Apple's iPad is Flat-out fun. Learn, play, surf and create on the iPad's stunning Retina display. Whether you're enjoying photos, shopping, or building a presentation, the vivid 9.7-inch Retina display has the detail and size to really bring them to life. The 64-bit A9 chip delivers performance that makes every app feel fast and fluid. Explore rich learning apps, play graphics-intensive games, or even use two apps at once. All while enjoying up to 10 hours of battery life. The lastest iOS brings iPad to life like never before. New features and capabilities let you get more done, more quickly and easily, making it a phenomally powerful and personal experience. Your fingerprint is the perfect password because it's unique and always with you. Touch ID lets you unlock your iPad instantly and secure private data in apps. You can also use it to make purchases with Apple Pay in apps and websites.

products.name: BLU - M8L Plus 8" 32GB Tablet (Unlocked) - Blue
products.albumTitle: M8L Plus 8" 32GB Tablet (Unlocked)
products.longDescription: Premium design are all the rage and the all new BLU M8L PLUS tablet is all about the image. With a super smooth state of the art paint, hand held experience if out of this world. Look into the M8L PLUS and see that the high definition 8” display projects the most vivid color and picture clarity. Graced with a elegant 2.5D curved glass that brings the M8L PLUS to another level. Octa-Core power with 2.0GHz speed that will make your life seamless. Work related emails or browsing the internet for fun nothing slows your down. Capture all your favorite memories with 8 Megapixel main camera and 5 Megapixel selfie. Live life to the fullest. Never have to run low on battery, the M8L PLUS is equipped with a powerful 4,300mAh battery for all day usage. Blazing speed OS that allows apps to start up 15% faster when you run Android 11.

products.name: Samsung - Galaxy Tab S8+ 12.4" 512GB Wi-Fi with S-Pen - Graphite
products.albumTitle: Galaxy Tab S8+ 12.4" 512GB Wi-Fi with S-Pen
products.longDescription: Plus-up your life with Galaxy Tab S8+, a premium tablet with a large screen and PC-like capabilities that helps you do more on the go.

products.longDescription: Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products are thoroughly, painstakingly and lovingly tested, so you can be sure that your device will work right, right away. Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products.The 11-inch iPad Pro features an immersive, edge-to-edge Liquid Retina display.¹ The new pro cameras, Wide and new Ultra Wide, combined with the all-new LiDAR Scanner enable entirely new experiences in the next generation of augmented reality (AR) apps. A12Z Bionic chip for powering essential apps and graphics-intensive games. Support for the new Magic Keyboard with trackpad² and Apple Pencil.² All-day battery life.³ And access to millions of apps on the App Store to transform iPad Pro into anything you need, anywhere you need it.

products.name: NUU Mobile - Tab 10 32GB Wi-Fi + Cellular (Unlocked) - Black
products.albumTitle: Tab 10 32GB Wi-Fi + Cellular (Unlocked)
products.longDescription: The Tab 10 gets more done – with both Wi-Fi and cellular connectivity, powerful chipset performance, 13MP camera, ultra-definition 10.1" display and a long-lasting battery with fast charging. Everything you need in Tab 10 - take your business to new heights with the newest generation of unlocked 4G-LTE Android tablets from NUU. The ample internal storage, in combination with Google’s cloud services, easily satisfies all storage demands for photos, music, games, and movies. With a healthy supply of RAM, Tab 10 can multitask with even the most demanding applications. Powered by a mighty octa-core processor that ensures smooth and responsive performance across Android and all applications. Not enough storage? Add up to 1TB with a microSD card (not included). The Tab 10 boasts an impressive, ultra-resolution 10.1” 1920x1200 display, with a remarkable brightness of 400 nits, delivering a dazzling viewing experience. Whether watching video, reading and editing documents, viewing presentations, or running through emails for work, everything will be crystal clear - even under direct sunlight. Capturing key moments by photo and video has never been easier with the Tab 10’s 13MP main camera, and equally suitable for technical captures such as document scans, optical character recognition, and QR codes. Impress your friends and business associates with Tab 10's high-resolution selfie camera for video conferencing and impromptu video calls alike, bringing the team together no matter where you are. Tab 10's large-capacity 6,000 mAh battery with 18W fast charge is designed to support your work all day long - giving you the ability to work, stream video, conference, and browse the internet on a single charge. And when you do need to recharge, there's the 18W fast-charging USB-C port. Tab 10 gives the ability to connect to other devices and accessories through its USB On-The-Go (OTG) functionality. With plug-and-play-like ease, Tab 10 connects to external hard drives, cameras, USB drives, keyboards, mice, and other accessories - giving your teams the flexibility to operate Tab 10 like a computer when needed. Operate conveniently, but securely, with just a touch. Authorize, pay, or unlock anything with the embedded fingerprint sensor, allowing you to keep everything important out of the wrong hands. Google's Android 11 brings ever-greater savings in memory and storage, as well as faster start-up speed for all of your apps. Effortless, wireless micro-communications. Pair your audio devices, pay your bill, or read a tag with ease through NFC technology. Discover a new level of efficiency with NFC-enabled “handshaking”.

products.longDescription: Fire HD 8 Plus offers everything you get with a Fire HD 8 and more- wireless charging, 9W power adapter, 3 GB RAM, 2 MP front-facing and  5 MP rear-facing cameras. As measured in tumble tests, Fire HD 8 Plus is twice as durable as Apple iPad mini (2021).

products.name: Apple - Pre-Owned 7.9-Inch iPad Mini (4th Generation) with Wi-Fi/Cellular LTE - 128GB - Space Gray
products.albumTitle: Pre-Owned 7.9-Inch iPad Mini (4th Generation) with Wi-Fi/Cellular LTE - 128GB
products.longDescription: There's more to mini than meets the eye. iPad mini 4 puts uncompromising performance and potential in your hand. It's thinner and lighter than ever before, yet powerful enough to help you take your idea even further. The iPad mini 4 is Ridiculously light. Seriously thin. - iPad mini 4 puts everything you love about iPad into an incredibly sleek and portable design. So you can enjoy FaceTime calls with friends or get work done, whereever and whenever you want. iPad mini 4 is powered by an A8 chip with second-generation 64-bit desktop-class architecture that can handle even your most demanding apps. Whether you're editing a video, browsing photos, or both, your experience will be smooth and seamless. All while enjoying up to 10 hours of battery life. The camera in iPad mini 4 delivers advanced optics, an improved sensor, and an Apple-designed image signal processor. It also includes handy features like panorama, time-lapse video, slo-mo, and burst and timer modes. The front-facing FaceTime HD camera has been redesigned, too, with a redefined sensor and larger pixels for even better low-light performance. The upshot? All your photos and videos - and video call and selfies - look incredibly vivid. iPad mini 4 uses Touch ID technology to turn your fingerprint into the perfect unforgettable password. So you can unlock your device with just one touch and keep your personal data secure, even if you share your iPad with someone else. Touch ID also lets you make secure purchases in iTunes, iBooks, and the App Store.

products.name: Vankyo - MatrixPad S7 Kids Tablet 7 inch IPS HD Display - Blue
products.albumTitle: MatrixPad S7 Kids Tablet 7 inch IPS HD Display
products.longDescription: Vankyo MatrixPad S7 kids tablet comes with the COPPA Certified Kid App Kidoz preloaded, a shock-resistant bumper with a built-in stand and Eye Health mode which filters blue light. It's 7 inch HD display, 1.3 GHz quad-core processor, Android 10 Go OS, Bluetooth and it weights less than 1 lb. Supporting 38 languages, every kid can play on it. 32GB on-board storage can be expandable up to 128GB via the microSD card slot.

products.albumTitle: MatrixPad S8 Kids Tablet 8 inch IPS HD Display

Built-in 32GB storage space, and can be expanded to 128GB through the Micro SD slot, you can easily save all the children's favorite photos, games and movies.
